meanings.definition: A person who has an unselfish concern for the welfare of others.
meanings.sent1: The altruists in our community always help those in need without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent2: Many altruists volunteer at shelters to assist homeless individuals.
meanings.sent3: The group of altruists decided to throw a surprise party for the self-centered mayor.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness shone brightly, making her stand out as one of the altruists in a sea of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The image of the altruists working together to rebuild the playground left a lasting impression on the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Those who practice altruism by performing selfless acts for the benefit of others.
meanings.sent1: During the charity event, the altruists collected donations to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The altruists organized a fundraiser to support the local orphanage.
meanings.sent3: The group of altruists decided to bake cookies for the grumpy old man next door.
meanings.sent4: Their actions spoke louder than words, showcasing them as true altruists in the community.
meanings.sent5: The altruists' generosity knew no bounds, touching the lives of many in profound ways.
